abstract: Kei Nishikori defeats Ryan Harrison in opening round of Memphis Open; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Kei Nishikori opened his bid for a fourth straight Memphis Open title with a 6-2, 7-5 victory over Ryan Harrison.

headline.main: Kei Nishikori Wins in Memphis Open

snippet: Top-seeded Kei Nishikori opened his bid for a fourth straight Memphis Open title with a 6-2, 7-5 victory over Ryan Harrison.
